class.name: PLATEAUMeshExporter
class.brief_description: Exports mesh data to various file formats.
class.description: PLATEAUMeshExporter exports [PLATEAUMeshData] to standard 3D file formats including glTF, GLB, and OBJ. [codeblock] var exporter = PLATEAUMeshExporter.new() exporter.export_to_file(mesh_data_array, "output.glb", PLATEAUMeshExporter.EXPORT_FORMAT_GLB) [/codeblock]

method.name: export_to_file
method.description: Export mesh data to the specified file path in the given format. Returns [code]true[/code] on success. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS/visionOS).

method.name: get_supported_formats
method.description: Returns an array of supported export format names.

method.name: get_format_extension
method.description: Returns the file extension for the specified format.

members.member: Directory path for textures (relative to output file, for glTF only).

constants.constant: glTF format with separate binary and texture files.

Wavefront OBJ with MTL material file. [b]Note:[/b] OBJ export creates one group per CityObject (building). When re-importing into Godot, this may exceed the 256 surface limit ([code]MAX_MESH_SURFACES[/code]). Use AREA granularity before export to merge meshes.
